name: H2X
description:
H2X (Halloween to X-Mas) contains most of my free games. If you like dark platformer or horror 1st person games. This is your package. You can find every single game also as a single downloadable file here:

https://gamesbybass.itch.io/doas also contains a PDF file "Behind the scenes"
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/doas-addon
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/diary-of-a-madman
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/akui
and the demo from: https://gamesbybass.itch.io/akuitheinsanecultists

Also: Akui - The Insane Cultists has a -50% Discount until the end of the year!
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/akuitheinsanecultists

Have fun,
BASS
